item.description:
Join us each month at our powerful learning and networking event for entrepreneurs of color. Hear experts in a wide variety of fields share advice to take you and your enterprise to the next level.

This month's speaker is Mike Bruny, a certified life coach, international speaker, and author. Mike will present on "The New Art of Conference Networking: #Hashtags to Handshakes," hitting on tips to make you feel like Norm from the T.V. show Cheers when you walk into your next conference. He will cover for 4 main areas: 1. Focus (setting goals) 2. Engagement 3. At Event 4. Follow-up

Free admission with RSVP so register today.

If you would like to sponsor a meeting or provide giveaways, contact echo -at- echonewengland.com

 

*note area parking is limited. The venue is near the Mass Ave. T stop. Please make every effort to arrive on time as we will have a packed agenda.
item.name: Entrepreneurs of Color Helping Others (ECHO) Monthly Meeting
